text.tspan: To begin my approach at solving the issue of trend obsession, I researched what it was about the most
popular ecommerce websites for clothes like Asos, Topshop, Amazon that made them so popular. I
discovered that not only did they always have the latest trends on hand, but their UI for shopping was quick
and acsessable. All three of these websites valued the user being able to easily find what trend they wanted,
as well as offered other items to purchase that matched well with them. However, I also realized how little
interaction the user would have with the clothing before actually purchasing; leaving it all up to guessing
weather or not the item would fit and leaving possibility for return.
